segments.text: Donna , you really shocked everyone at the party last night !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes ! We have all assumed that you were the quiet , shy type .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess everyone has a few secrets up their sleeve .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where did you learn to sing like that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was part of a band in school .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You ? Wow . And why don't you ever dress like that at work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Come on ! This is work . Don't you think that would be a little weird ?
segments.speaker: S2
